titleStmt.title: The historie of Guicciardin conteining the vvarres of Italie and other partes, continued for many yeares vnder sundry kings and princes, together with the variations and accidents of the same, deuided into twenty bookes: and also the argumentes, vvith a table at large expressing the principall matters through the vvhole historie. Reduced into English by Geffray Fenton.
Historia d'Italia. English
titleStmt.author: Guicciardini, Francesco, 1483-1540.
Fenton, Geoffrey, Sir, 1539?-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Vautroullier dvvelling in the Blackfriers by Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: La historia d'Italia.
Variant: title page lacks the words ", deuided into twenty bookes".
A variant of the edition with William Norton named as publisher in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
